Name: Heisenberg Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. (Most appropriately served in a science beaker.)
Review: Like a suitably complex chemistry experiment, this Margarita-like cocktail has seven ingredients with mezcal adding smoky notes to tequila and a trio of liqueurs balancing lime sourness.
History: Adapted from a drink created in September 2013 at Mark's Bar, Soho, London to celebrate the last episode of Breaking Bad inspired by the show's blue crystal meth.
Nutrition: One serving of Heisenberg Cocktail contains 197 calories
Garnish: Lime juice and blue-coloured salt rim
